channel.title: Posts on Michael Nguyen
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Michael Nguyen

item.title: An Amazing Introduction to Python!
item.description: I think one of my favorite things about coding is that it really is another language. Personally, I find the idea of languages very fascinating. I think for me it’s how we associate meanings with certain symbols, sounds, and the order they come in. Python is no different. I find it interesting of how we can program a machine to solve problems, collect data and interpret it. print("Hello World") ## Hello World Take the line of code above for example.

item.title: Hello There!
item.description: Hello There! Welcome to my personal website! My name is Michael Nguyen. I am a third-year student the University of Texas at Austin pursuing a Bachelor of Science and Arts Degree in Biology. I made this website as a project for my Biostatistic course. It features two projects regarding Data Analysis and Modeling for data that I’ve found on the internet. I’ve also included my resume and personal social media on this site if you want to get to know a little more about me.
